column5: A friend sent me a video of some guys down south who host an event called Iron Fly, they use the same premiss as Iron Chef, except with fly tying. You get a few materials and a certain amount of time to come up with a fly using only those materials. I asked them if we could run an event up here, they say they're open to the idea, I just wanted to see if we'd even have interest before I start worrying about a venue. I figure we could host it at a community centre and get a rod or something for a prize if we all pitched in $10 per night. So who's interested?
I've posted this everywhere, figure I'd cover my bases.
OOooh and then run a mini tourney to fish the fly you tied... That would be groovy!  Count me in.
If anyone wants in just post here and I'll add your name to a list.
I have lots of feathers, but I dont tie flies lol  S.
I have lots of feathers, but I dont tie flies lol  S. Still have to find some time to get out there this winter, it will happen!!  Fishnautographs, you're in!
